strategy_reasoning: Using the 'cozy pixel garden' metaphor perfectly translates technical updates (URL fixes, error handling) into a welcoming visual language. The addition of a new bot is represented as a new character in the garden, making the community contribution feel special and tangible.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene of a cute tiny robot character arriving in a lush digital garden. The robot is waving hello. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW BOT ALERT'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: Introduces the new TeleChars AI bot as a friendly character entering the Pollinations ecosystem.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a tiny bee mechanic fixing a garden irrigation pipe with a golden wrench. Clear blue water flowing smoothly through the pipes. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'PIPES FIXED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: Visualizes the 'URL encoding' and 'workflow' fixes as fixing the plumbing in the garden to let data flow smoothly.

images.prompt: Retro pixel art game UI 'Patch Notes' scroll floating in a sky with fluffy clouds. Beige parchment style. Icons showing a robot face, a wrench, and a warning sign. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Text in pixel font: 'UPDATE LOG'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: A summary card in the style of an RPG inventory or quest log.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy pixel art images. 1. A cute 8-bit robot waving in a lime green garden. 2. A pixel bee fixing a water pipe with a wrench. 3. A retro RPG-style scroll showing update icons against a pastel sky.
